data.text: @SashaFB Why do you give the nut the time of day?

@SashaFB Meghans sister is simply frustrated. Being disabled with little finance cannot be easy.  Instead of making peace with her young sibling, she's turned out to be vile towards Meghan. I see this as misplaced anger and frustration. Make PEACE!

@SashaFB It is very sad indeed to have everlasting feuds in the family/s.  For instance the Royal Wedding was fabulous,  but watching Meghan's mother seated alone was pitiful and sad. Families should learn to forgive.
